<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataCI extends data { const CODE = 'CI'; const PREFIX = 225; const REGION = 'Africa'; const PATTERNS = array( '[02-9]\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:2(?:0[023]|1[02357]|[23][045]|4[03-5])|3(?:0[06]|1[069]|[2-4][07]|5[09]|6[08]))\d{5}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '97[0-3]\d{5}|(?:0[1-9]|[457]\d|6[014-9]|8[4-9]|95)\d{6}'=>array( 'mobile', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', ); }
